header.title: I Am A Liberal, Part Two

entry.p: Regarding the idea of reclaiming the word 'liberal', here's a line I just heard in Bob Dylan's song I Shall Be Free No. 10:

blockquote.p:
Now, I'm liberal, but to a degree
I want ev'rybody to be free
But if you think that I'll let Barry Goldwater
Move in next door and marry my daughter
You must think I'm crazy!

entry.p: The complaint about Barry Goldwater was to be expected (this was 1964, after all), but the assumption is that a true liberal wants everyone to be free, which sounds rather libertarian to me. Yes, "I am a liberal". :-)
